it.polimi.deib.se2018.adrenalina.View

Class NetworkHandlerRMI

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.rmi.server.RemoteObject
      • java.rmi.server.RemoteServer
        • java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
          • it.polimi.deib.se2018.adrenalina.View.NetworkHandlerRMI
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    InterfaceNetworkHandlerRMI, Observer<ResponseInput>, java.io.Serializable, java.rmi.Remote

    public class NetworkHandlerRMI
extends java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
implements InterfaceNetworkHandlerRMI, Observer<ResponseInput>
    This class implements a network handler that handles the comunication through RMI
    Author:
    Cysko7927
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      NetworkHandlerRMI(PrivateView view, java.lang.String ip, int port)
      Create a network handler tha handle the communication between the client and server using RMI This constructor instances the server RMI and do the rebind of the interface of the network handler on the port 6000

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void deregister(Observer<RequestInput> observer)
      Remove a observer for message of type RequestInput
      MessageNet getResponseMessage()
      this method being called by server in remote and if the message of response is ready the method returns it else suspend the caller until the message is not ready
      void receiveMessageRequest(MessageNet message)
      this method being called by server in remote passing like parameter the message to send at network Handler and it open the message , sees the type of message and responds in different way: 1)If the type of message is "StartTurn": the network handler starts a thread that executes the method "startTurn" of the privateView 2)If the type of message is "ping": the network handler responds sending at the server a message of pong 3)If the type of message is "AskCredentials": the network handler responds sending the credentials of the user 4)If the type of message is "RequestInput": the network handler calls the method update (using notify) of the privateView so it receives the request of the server 5)If the type of message is "RequestToUseGrenade": the network handler starts a thread that executes the method "requestToUseGrenade" of the privateView 6)If the type of message is "RequestToRespawn": the network handler starts a thread that executes the method "startRespawn" of the privateView 7)If the type of message is "StartFrenesy" of "StartFrenesyB": the network handler starts a thread that executes the method "startFrenesy" of the privateView 8)If the type of message is "StartTerminator": the network handler starts a thread that executes the method "startTerminator" of the privateView 9)If the type of message is "RespawnTerminator": the network handler starts a thread that executes the method "respawnTerminator" of the privateView 10)If the type of message is "GenericMessage": the network handler using the gui or cli to print the string inside the genericMessage
      void register(Observer<RequestInput> observer)
      Add a new observer for message of type RequestInput
      void startConnection(java.lang.String ip, int port)
      This method can be used by view to reactive RMI after a disconnection
      void update(ResponseInput message)
      Method used by private view to ask at the network handler to send a message of ResponseInput The method saves the message in his buffer and after this message will take by server using the method "getResponseMessage"
      void updateModel(UpdateModel message)
      this method can be called by server in remote to ask at private view to update its copy of the model with the new version sent by server

    • Constructor Detail

      • NetworkHandlerRMI

        public NetworkHandlerRMI(PrivateView view,
                         java.lang.String ip,
                         int port)
                  throws java.io.IOException
        Create a network handler tha handle the communication between the client and server using RMI This constructor instances the server RMI and do the rebind of the interface of the network handler on the port 6000
        Parameters:
        view - private view that will receive and will send the messages
        ip - IPV4 address of the server
        port - port TCP of the server
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if there were problems of connections

    • Method Detail

      • startConnection

        public void startConnection(java.lang.String ip,
                            int port)
                     throws java.io.IOException
        This method can be used by view to reactive RMI after a disconnection
        Parameters:
        ip - IPV4 address of Server
        port - Port TCP of the serve
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if there are problems with the connection

      • getResponseMessage

        public MessageNet getResponseMessage()
                              throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        this method being called by server in remote and if the message of response is ready the method returns it else suspend the caller until the message is not ready
        Specified by:
        getResponseMessage in interface InterfaceNetworkHandlerRMI
        Returns:
        message to response
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - if there were problems with RMI

      • receiveMessageRequest

        public void receiveMessageRequest(MessageNet message)
                           throws java.rmi.RemoteException,
                                  java.lang.Exception
        this method being called by server in remote passing like parameter the message to send at network Handler and it open the message , sees the type of message and responds in different way: 1)If the type of message is "StartTurn": the network handler starts a thread that executes the method "startTurn" of the privateView 2)If the type of message is "ping": the network handler responds sending at the server a message of pong 3)If the type of message is "AskCredentials": the network handler responds sending the credentials of the user 4)If the type of message is "RequestInput": the network handler calls the method update (using notify) of the privateView so it receives the request of the server 5)If the type of message is "RequestToUseGrenade": the network handler starts a thread that executes the method "requestToUseGrenade" of the privateView 6)If the type of message is "RequestToRespawn": the network handler starts a thread that executes the method "startRespawn" of the privateView 7)If the type of message is "StartFrenesy" of "StartFrenesyB": the network handler starts a thread that executes the method "startFrenesy" of the privateView 8)If the type of message is "StartTerminator": the network handler starts a thread that executes the method "startTerminator" of the privateView 9)If the type of message is "RespawnTerminator": the network handler starts a thread that executes the method "respawnTerminator" of the privateView 10)If the type of message is "GenericMessage": the network handler using the gui or cli to print the string inside the genericMessage
        Specified by:
        receiveMessageRequest in interface InterfaceNetworkHandlerRMI
        Parameters:
        message - message passed by server calling in remote this method
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - if there were problems with RMI
        java.lang.Exception - if there were problems with RMI

      • updateModel

        public void updateModel(UpdateModel message)
                 throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        this method can be called by server in remote to ask at private view to update its copy of the model with the new version sent by server
        Specified by:
        updateModel in interface InterfaceNetworkHandlerRMI
        Parameters:
        message - new version sent by server
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - if there were problems with RMI

      • update

        public void update(ResponseInput message)
        Method used by private view to ask at the network handler to send a message of ResponseInput The method saves the message in his buffer and after this message will take by server using the method "getResponseMessage"
        Specified by:
        update in interface Observer<ResponseInput>
        Parameters:
        message - message of ResponseInput to send at the server

      • register

        public void register(Observer<RequestInput> observer)
        Add a new observer for message of type RequestInput

      • deregister

        public void deregister(Observer<RequestInput> observer)
        Remove a observer for message of type RequestInput
